newsitem.title: USA: HOT STOCKS HIGHLIGHTS - Corporate Earnings.
newsitem.headline: HOT STOCKS HIGHLIGHTS - Corporate Earnings.

text.p: The following companies reported quarterly earnings today:

* Compaq Computer Corp reported higher-than-expected third quarter earnings of $1.25 per fully diluted share versus $0.89 a year ago. Shares, which rose sharply ahead of the report, fell 2-1/4 to 72-1/2.

* Time Warner Inc reported a third quarter loss of $0.43 per share. Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization rose to $99 million from $86 million a year ago. Shares fell 1/4 to 40-5/8.
* Ethan Allen Interiors Inc reported first quarter earnings per share nearly doubled to $0.60 from $0.31. Shares rose 1-5/8 to 32-1/8.

* BankAmerica Corp reported third quarter earnings of $1.75 per share versus $1.72 last year. Excluding the bank's SAIF assessment, earnings for the most recent quarter were $1.88 per share. Shares fell 3/4 to 87-1/4.
* Merck & Co Inc reported third quarter earnings of $0.83 per share versus $0.70 a year ago. Shares were unchanged at 71-1/4.
* GTE Corp reported third quarter earnings of $0.78 per share versus $0.71 a year ago. Shares rose 1-1/8 to 39-3/4.
* Coca-Cola Enterprises Inc reported third quarter earnings of $0.29 per share versus $0.27 a year ago. Shares rose 3/8 to 44-3/4.
* Ford Motor Co reported third quarter earnings of $0.56 per diluted share versus $0.27 a year ago. The current quarter included $0.03 net gains. Shares fell 3/4 to 32-1/2.
